meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Michael Boss Lydia Disabatino Jack Dickey Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7733.

td.p: Michael Boss, a physicist from Broomfield, Colorado
Lydia Disabatino, a data analyst from Chicago, Illinois
Jack Dickey, a journalist from New York, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $30,401)

tr.td: HOTELS & MOTELS
VIRGINIA GOVERNORS
BIG 12 SCHOOLS
THE FICTION SECTION
BETTING AT THE TRACK
THE POSTMAN'S 4-LETTER WORDS
(Alex: Each response will combine two state postal abbreviations.)
